mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, user_id, user_pw, user_type, phone_num, name, email) VALUES (seq_member_id.nextval, ${user_id}, ${user_pw}, ${user_type}, ${phone_num}, ${name}, ${email})
INSERT INTO address (addr_id, member_id, zipcode, addr1, addr2) VALUES(seq_address_id.nextval, seq_member_id.currval, ${zipcode}, ${addr1}, ${addr2})

INSERT INTO farm (farm_id, member_id, account, brand_name, com_addr1, com_addr2, com_zip, owner_name, depositor) VALUES(${farm_id}, seq_member_id.currval, ${account}, ${brand_name}, ${com_addr1}, ${com_addr2}, ${com_zip}, ${owner_name}, ${depositor})
